content.rendered:
A Safe Place to Begin Again

We’re a private drug and alcohol rehab centre in the heart of Hertfordshire, kind, supportive and deeply personal in our approach. Whether you’re calling for yourself or someone close to you, we’ll help make the next step feel possible.

Call Us
  • Medical detox Included
  • Talk to us confidentially

We Don’t Just Treat Addiction. We Support People.

Addiction rarely happens in isolation. Behind the symptoms are stories of grief, stress, trauma, unmet needs and mental health struggles that were never given space to heal.

At Abbington House, we don’t just focus on stopping the drinking or drug use. We help you explore what’s beneath it, at your own pace and with real support from professionals who have walked the recovery journey themselves.

Rehab Programme
Our residential rehab programme consists of medical detox, therapeutic care, family support and aftercare to support long-term recovery.
Rehab Programme
Drug Rehab
Break free from drug addiction with personalised, trauma-informed care. Discover safe, supportive rehab that helps you rebuild your life.
Drug Rehab
Drug Detox
Struggling with cocaine, heroin, or prescription drug withdrawal? Our private drug detox in Stevenage provides 24/7 medical care.
Drug Detox
Alcohol Rehab
Start your recovery journey today. Our alcohol rehab centre in Hertfordshire offers detox, therapy, and aftercare support with no judgment.
Alcohol Rehab
Alcohol Detox
Our alcohol detox programme provides safe and effective withdrawal for those who are alcohol dependent.
Alcohol Detox
Private Rehab with Immediate Access
Our private rehab in Hertfordshire provides fast admissions, personalised programmes, and expert-led addiction recovery.
Private Rehab

Take the first step towards change, towards freedom, towards recovery

A life beyond addiction is possible. We know this because many of us at Abbington House have lived through addiction and found recovery.

Call us today to begin your journey. Whether you’re seeking help for yourself or you’re calling on behalf of a loved one, our admissions team will talk you through the process and address any questions or concerns you may have.
Call 03000 616161
"As the clinical manager at Abbington House, I can definitely say that a life beyond addiction is truly possible. I have been there myself. You are in safe hands with us"

- Michael Williams

Located in Stevenage. Serving Hertfordshire and Beyond

We can arrange quick admission for you or a loved one from the following areas:

  • Watford
  • Hemel Hempstead
  • St Albans
  • Hatfield
  • London
  • Luton

What Makes Us Different?

Trauma-Informed and Neurodivergent-Aware

We support people with ADHD, PTSD, anxiety, childhood trauma and emotional overwhelm. Some of our clients are late-diagnosed or high-functioning professionals. Our facility is ideal for those who need space to recover.

Personalised Care At Every Step

No two people heal the same way. That’s why your treatment plan is built around you. We offer one-to-one therapy with a dedicated therapist, group support, holistic options, family support and aftercare.

A Real Home, Not a Hospital

We’ve created a nurturing, peaceful environment in a historic Hertfordshire setting. It’s calm, quiet and designed to feel like somewhere you can finally breathe.

  • Private & Confidential
  • Tailored Care
  • Medical Detox
  • Family Support
  • Aftercare

WHO WE HELP

Abbington House is open to adults aged 18+ from all walks of life. We support:

  • People struggling with alcohol, drugs, or behavioural addiction
  • Parents, carers and professionals who feel like they’re barely holding it together
  • Those living with addiction and trauma, anxiety, ADHD or burnout
  • Individuals who’ve been to rehab before and need more intensive treatment
  • Business professionals, CEO’s or medical professionals who need privacy.  

If you feel like it’s time to make a  change – you’re in the right place.

Meet our team

We’re proud to employ such a skilled group of addiction specialists who provide compassionate care and support to clients and their loved ones. Many of our team members have their own personal recovery stories, which means they understand the pain of suffering from this illness and understand challenges faced by our clients and their families.

Greg Georghiou
Founder
Open Profile
Michael Williams
Treatment Manager
Open Profile
Emily Bricknell
Manager
Open Profile
Dr. Olalekan Otulana
Doctor
Open Profile

What to Expect

You won’t be judged. You won’t be pushed. You will be supported.

  • Free initial phone consultation
  • Fast admissions (typically within 48 hours)
  • Clear, transparent pricing – no hidden fees
  • Comfortable rooms and nourishing food
  • Optional family support
  • Aftercare planning for life beyond rehab.

We can help you see a world beyond addiction.

CALL TODAY ON
03000 616161

Book an assessment with our team today.
